title: CraveCorner
description: A complete food delivery application with user-facing features for browsing and ordering, and an admin panel for managing food items, categories, and orders.

title: PolicyTrust
description: A full-stack policy management system with modules for customer registration, dashboards, and admin tools to manage policies and insurance schemes.

title: Shopping Cart
description: A React-based shopping cart application using DummyJSON API that allows users to add, remove, and manage items efficiently. It features real-time updates, responsive design, seamless shopping experience.

title: Product Page
description: A responsive product page for e-commerce applications, designed with a clean layout to display product details effectively across devices.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: An interactive Rock Paper Scissors game created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, deployed on GitHub Pages for easy access.

title: To-Do List
description: A to-do list app with add, edit, delete, and mark complete features, using local storage for persistent data across sessions.

title: Network Request Management
description: A ServiceNow application for automating network service requests with catalog items, approvals, workflows, and real-time notifications through emails.

title: Educational Organisation Management
description: A ServiceNow solution for managing student and teacher data, admissions, and academic processes with workflow automation and reporting.
